text: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلسَّاعَةِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
translation: 11. Wonna hinnay Nabiyow atu maaqo takmech sookul gexxam hinna koros koo kah dirabbossam, dirabboysaanam Qhiyaamah ayrô kal, kaadu Qhiyaamah ayró dirabboyse marah Saqiir deqsitta girá massosne akeeral.
